attributes.action: Fred Goodwin's knighthood should be revoked
attributes.additional_details:
With all the findings on the RBS and the amount of public monies which has been used in the failure of the bank- the main person responsible- Fred Goodwin should no longer be using'sir' in his title.
His part in the whole failure of RBS and the country's downturn and subsequent recession is a mark of shame to our nation and he does not deserve this title.
